Text: I'm just curious, how do you get such a small file size out of 720p resolution?  It seem that people who use x264 in a mkv container keep the file size over 4GB.  What's your secret for 400MB files?
i noticed the video bit rate is 576 Kbps... normaly it's around 5,000 kbps.
@johnmbot: Normally its not 5000 kbps. But Bluray bitrate is kinda +- to that..
@lydonit13: google it mate.. You'll know the tips & tricks.. Just for example the audio is 2 channel there i saved a lot of megabytes..
